channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12733] Remove references to obsolete io.seqfile configuration variables
item.description:
The following variables appear to no longer be used.

io.seqfile.lazydecompress
io.seqfile.sorter.recordlimit
item.summary: Remove references to obsolete io.seqfile configuration variables

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
